Html:
According to rawr, for an Arcane mage, Reign of the Unliving (normal) is not that good compared to Scale of Fate, Abyssal Rune, Sundial of the Exiled, Embrace of the Spider ... etc.

I would like to know if this info is correct ? Is the proc calculated correctly for the arcane build ?

It seems to be very good for a fire mage, but I don't see why not for an arcane mage, since both of them according to my recount, do around 2-3 % of my damage output.

Thank you
Did you make sure that it has the proc effect on it? ie, do you see it on the tooltip? Try refreshing its data if not.
